document.topic_text: Home / News / Dry fruits curry Dry fruits curry Garam masala powder – 1/2 tsp Oil – 4 tsp Poppy seeds – 2 tbsp (Soak it in hot water for 10 – 20 minutes) Method: 1. 1. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, fry the dry fruits lightly and keep aside. 2. Add 2 tbsp oil in a pan. add cumin seeds and garam masala, fry for a few seconds and add curd and ground poppy seed paste. 3. Fry again till the oil seperates. 4. Add tomato puree and cashewnut paste and stir for some time. Add 2 cups of water and bring the mixture to a boil. 5. Then add the dry fruits and simmer for 5 – 10 minutes on a medium heat. 6. Springle coriander leaves and paneer.Sreve hot with puris. courtesy: food.sulekha
